scripts.clean: echo '=> CLEANING' && rm -rf public && mkdir public
scripts.prebuild: npm run -s test && npm run -s clean
scripts.lint: npm run -s lint:js && npm run -s lint:html && npm run -s lint:css
scripts.lint:html: echo '-> linting html' && htmllint --rc test/.htmllintrc src/*.html
scripts.build:zip: echo '-> building for chrome and firefox stores' && cd src; zip -0r ../public/extension.zip ./*; cd ..
